title: Parle-G Original Glucose Biscuits
name: Parle-G Original Glucose Biscuits
description: Parle-G is a classic glucose biscuit made from wheat flour and enriched with the goodness of milk and glucose. It provides instant energy and is loved by people of all ages.
shortDescription: Classic glucose biscuits for energy and taste

title: Parle-G Gold Premium Glucose Biscuits
name: Parle-G Gold Premium Glucose Biscuits
description: Parle-G Gold is a richer and crunchier version of the iconic Parle-G biscuits. Made with the goodness of wheat flour, milk, and added glucose, it provides an enhanced taste and instant energy with every bite.
shortDescription: Premium glucose biscuits for energy and taste

title: Britannia Good Day Cashew Cookies
name: Britannia Good Day Cashew Cookies
description: Britannia Good Day Cashew Cookies are made with rich buttery dough and loaded with crunchy cashew bits. These cookies offer a delightful taste and melt-in-mouth texture that make every tea-time special.
shortDescription: Buttery cookies packed with crunchy cashews

title: Britannia Good Day Butter Cookies
name: Britannia Good Day Butter Cookies
description: Britannia Good Day Butter Cookies are deliciously rich and buttery cookies made from premium ingredients. With their soft crunch and smooth texture, they bring a perfect balance of sweetness and buttery flavor to every bite.
shortDescription: Rich, buttery cookies with a soft crunch

title: Parle 20-20 Cashew Cookies 30g Pack
name: Parle 20-20 Cashew Cookies 30g Pack
description: Parle 20-20 Cashew Cookies 30g Pack offers the same rich taste of crunchy cashews and buttery flavor in a smaller, on-the-go pack. Perfect for quick snacks or tea-time treats.
shortDescription: Mini pack of crispy cashew cookies for on-the-go snacking

title: Parle Monaco Classic Salted Biscuits
name: Parle Monaco Classic Salted Biscuits
description: Parle Monaco Classic Salted Biscuits are light, crispy, and perfectly salted crackers that make for a delightful snack any time of the day. They pair perfectly with tea, cheese, or your favorite toppings.
shortDescription: Light and crispy salted biscuits for snacking

title: Britannia Marie Gold Biscuits 10₹ Pack
name: Britannia Marie Gold Biscuits 10₹ Pack
description: Britannia Marie Gold 10₹ Pack offers the same classic, light, and crispy wheat biscuits in a smaller, travel-friendly pack. Perfect for tea-time or quick snacks, it’s a healthy and tasty choice made from the goodness of wheat.
shortDescription: Mini pack of light and crispy wheat biscuits

title: Amul Gold Full Cream Milk
name: Amul Gold Full Cream Milk
description: Amul Gold Full Cream Milk is a rich and creamy milk with 6% milk fat, offering a delicious taste and complete nutrition. Perfect for drinking, making tea, coffee, or preparing Indian sweets and desserts. It is hygienically packed to retain freshness and purity.
shortDescription: Rich and creamy full cream milk with 6% fat content

title: Sanchi Gold Full Cream Milk
name: Sanchi Gold Full Cream Milk
description: Sanchi Gold Full Cream Milk is a rich and wholesome milk variety with a high fat content, offering superior taste and nutrition. It is ideal for direct consumption, tea, coffee, and traditional Indian sweets. Packed hygienically to preserve its freshness and quality.
shortDescription: Rich and creamy full cream milk from Sanchi

title: Sanchi Smart Double Toned Milk
name: Sanchi Smart Double Toned Milk
description: Sanchi Smart Double Toned Milk is a healthy and nutritious choice for those who prefer low-fat milk without compromising on taste. It is rich in protein and calcium, making it ideal for everyday use in tea, coffee, and breakfast cereals. Hygienically processed and packed to retain freshness.
shortDescription: Low-fat double toned milk rich in protein and calcium

title: Sachamoti Sabudana (Mota)
name: Sachamoti Sabudana (Mota)
description: Sachamoti Sabudana (Mota) is made from premium quality tapioca pearls that cook into soft, fluffy pearls when soaked or boiled. Perfect for making traditional dishes like sabudana khichdi, kheer, and vadas. It is rich in carbohydrates, making it an excellent energy source.
shortDescription: High-quality tapioca pearls ideal for khichdi, kheer, and vadas

title: Maggi 2-Minute Masala Noodles
name: Maggi 2-Minute Masala Noodles
description: Maggi 2-Minute Masala Noodles is India’s most-loved instant snack, made with choicest quality spices and wheat flour noodles. Ready in just 2 minutes, it offers a delicious masala taste that’s perfect for quick hunger cravings, tiffins, or evening snacks.
shortDescription: Classic instant noodles with rich masala flavor

title: Gangwal Besan (Gram Flour)
name: Gangwal Besan (Gram Flour)
description: Gangwal Besan (Gram Flour) is made from 100% pure and high-quality chana dal, finely ground to perfection. It is rich in protein, gluten-free, and ideal for preparing a variety of Indian dishes like pakoras, dhokla, chilla, and sweets such as ladoo. Hygienically processed and packed for freshness.
shortDescription: Pure chana dal flour ideal for snacks and sweets

title: Gangwal Rawa (Sooji)
name: Gangwal Rawa (Sooji)
description: Gangwal Rawa (Sooji) is made from high-quality wheat, finely milled to ensure a soft and grainy texture. Ideal for preparing dishes like upma, halwa, idli, and dhokla. It is rich in carbohydrates and provides instant energy, making it a staple for breakfast and snacks.
shortDescription: Premium quality semolina ideal for upma, halwa, and idli

title: Gangwal Maida (Refined Flour)
name: Gangwal Maida (Refined Flour)
description: Gangwal Maida (Refined Flour) is made from premium quality wheat, finely milled to produce soft and smooth flour. Perfect for baking, frying, and preparing snacks like samosas, pastries, cakes, and puris. Hygienically processed and packed to retain freshness and purity.
shortDescription: Finely milled refined wheat flour for baking and snacks

title: Moong Dal (Loose)
name: Moong Dal (Loose)
description: Open Moong Dal is freshly sourced and cleaned to ensure the highest quality. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients, it’s perfect for preparing dal, khichdi, and other Indian dishes. Its natural freshness and aroma make it a healthy addition to daily meals.
shortDescription: Protein-rich yellow moong dal perfect for everyday cooking

title: Toor Dal (Badi)(Loose)
name: Toor Dal (Badi)(Loose)
description: Open Toor Dal (Badi) is premium-quality split pigeon peas, rich in protein and fiber. It cooks easily to a soft texture and has a natural, earthy aroma. Perfect for preparing traditional Indian dishes like sambar, dal fry, and other protein-rich meals.
shortDescription: High-quality toor dal rich in protein and flavor

title: Open Toor Dal (Choti)(Loose)
name: Open Toor Dal (Choti)(Loose)
description: Open Toor Dal (Choti) is fine-quality split pigeon peas known for their smaller grain size and superior taste. Rich in protein and essential nutrients, it’s perfect for preparing dal fry, sambar, and other traditional Indian dishes. Easy to cook and full of natural aroma.
shortDescription: Fine-quality toor dal with smaller grains and rich flavor

title: Open Chana Dal (Loose)
name: Open Chana Dal (Loose)
description: Open Chana Dal is made from premium quality Bengal gram, cleaned and split to perfection. It is rich in protein, fiber, and iron, making it a nutritious choice for daily meals. Ideal for preparing dal, curries, and traditional Indian snacks like besan, pakoras, and vadas.
shortDescription: Protein-rich chana dal ideal for dal, curries, and snacks

title: Open Masoor Dal (Loose)
name: Open Masoor Dal (Loose)
description: Open Masoor Dal (Loose) is high-quality red lentils, known for their quick cooking and delicious earthy flavor. Rich in protein, fiber, and iron, this dal is perfect for making light, nutritious curries, soups, and stews. A staple in Indian kitchens for its health benefits and taste.
shortDescription: Protein-rich red lentils that cook fast and taste delicious

title: Open Urad Dal White (Loose)
name: Open Urad Dal White (Loose)
description: Open Urad Dal White (Loose) is premium quality split and skinned black gram, known for its smooth texture and rich protein content. Ideal for preparing idli, dosa, vada, and various South Indian dishes. It cooks quickly and gives a creamy consistency to your recipes.
shortDescription: High-quality white urad dal perfect for idli, dosa, and vada

title: Open Urad Dal Black (Loose)
name: Open Urad Dal Black (Loose)
description: Open Urad Dal Black (Loose) is unpolished whole black gram, rich in protein, iron, and fiber. It has a strong earthy flavor and is perfect for preparing dal makhani, Punjabi dal, and other traditional dishes. A nutritious addition to your daily diet.
shortDescription: Whole black urad dal rich in protein and fiber

title: Brooke Bond Taj Mahal Tea
name: Brooke Bond Taj Mahal Tea
description: Brooke Bond Taj Mahal Tea is crafted from the finest Assam tea leaves to deliver an unmatched flavor, aroma, and freshness. Known for its rich taste and strong aroma, this premium blend offers a truly royal tea experience. Perfect for those who love a full-bodied, refreshing cup.
shortDescription: Premium Assam tea with rich aroma and full-bodied taste

title: Madhur Pure Sugar
name: Madhur Pure Sugar
description: Madhur Pure Sugar is made from high-quality sugarcane and is 100% sulphur-free. Its crystal-clear texture and natural sweetness make it ideal for tea, coffee, desserts, and everyday cooking. Hygienically processed and packed to retain purity and freshness.
shortDescription: 100% pure sulphur-free sugar for daily use

title: Open Sugar (Loose)
name: Open Sugar (Loose)
description: Open Sugar (Loose) is made from high-quality sugarcane and refined naturally to preserve its sweetness and purity. Perfect for daily use in tea, coffee, desserts, and other household recipes. Cleaned and crystalized to ensure consistent quality and taste.
shortDescription: Refined loose sugar ideal for tea, coffee, and desserts

title: Kissan Tomato Sauce
name: Kissan Tomato Sauce
description: Kissan Tomato Sauce is made from 100% real, juicy tomatoes to give a perfect blend of sweet and tangy taste. It enhances the flavor of snacks like samosas, pakoras, sandwiches, and fries, making them even more delicious. A trusted companion for every meal.
shortDescription: Made from real tomatoes with a rich, tangy flavor

title: Maggi Pichkoo Tomato Ketchup
name: Maggi Pichkoo Tomato Ketchup
description: Maggi Pichkoo Tomato Ketchup is made from fresh, juicy tomatoes and blended with the perfect balance of tangy and sweet flavors. Its convenient squeezable Pichkoo pack makes it easy to use and store — ideal for quick snacks, samosas, sandwiches, and fries.
shortDescription: Tangy and sweet tomato ketchup in an easy Pichkoo pack

title: Pushp Haldi Powder
name: Pushp Haldi Powder
description: Pushp Haldi Powder is made from the finest quality turmeric roots, carefully cleaned, dried, and ground to perfection. It adds a rich golden color and earthy aroma to your dishes while offering natural antiseptic and healing properties.
shortDescription: Pure turmeric powder for color, flavor, and health benefits

title: Pushp Mirchi Powder
name: Pushp Mirchi Powder
description: Pushp Mirchi Powder is made from carefully selected, sun-dried red chilies that are finely ground to give a vibrant red color and perfect spiciness to every dish. Known for its aroma, freshness, and purity, it adds authentic Indian flavor to your meals.
shortDescription: Pure red chili powder with rich color and strong flavor

title: KPR Lung Sev
name: KPR Lung Sev
description: KPR Lung Sev is a crispy, crunchy, and spicy Indian snack made from gram flour and special aromatic spices. Perfect for tea-time snacking or pairing with poha, upma, and chaats. It delivers a delicious balance of crunch and traditional flavor loved by all age groups.
shortDescription: Crispy and spicy gram flour sev perfect for tea-time snacks

title: Dove Beauty Bathing Bar
name: Dove Beauty Bathing Bar
description: Dove Beauty Bathing Bar is enriched with ¼ moisturizing cream and gentle cleansers that nourish the skin deeply. It helps make skin soft, smooth, and radiant after every wash. Ideal for daily use on face and body, suitable for all skin types.
shortDescription: Moisturizing bathing bar for soft and smooth skin

title: No.1 Bathing Soap
name: No.1 Bathing Soap
description: Lifebuoy No.1 Bathing Soap provides trusted germ protection with a refreshing fragrance. It helps keep your skin healthy and clean while giving a long-lasting freshness. Perfect for everyday hygiene for the entire family.
shortDescription: Trusted germ protection soap for healthy and clean skin
